item.title: Breaking Into Data Science
item.description: This post comes at a time where I, myself, am feeling the first-hire blues. An overall sense of burnout, frustration, confusion. I’ve gotten well acquainted with the phrases, “We reget to inform you at this time…”, “Although we were impressed with your interview/qualifications…”, “[insert insincere compliment here]. Unfortunately, [insert rejection statement here] …”. I heard somebody say a few weeks back to “teach the thing you want to learn”.` It seems paradoxical and reminds me a bit of the Feynman technique.
